description: Smartwool's Men’s Merino Sport Lined short is made for comfort, with features like the Merino Sport 150 liner that supports, dries quickly, and provides benefits like breathability and temperature regulation. Plus, it’s designed with a body-hugging, adjustable fit; two pockets (one zippered); and reflective elements for when it’s dim out. All of that is surrounded by stretch-woven fabric with DWR coating, which makes these shorts as ready for beach volleyball as a hike to the summit.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport Lined Shorts, 5" Inseam - Mens
